channel.title: Radiation on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Radiation on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Fukushima maps
item.description: Radiation is escaping from the Fukushima nuclear power plant after multiple explosions at the site. A widely distributed graphic, attributed to Australian Radiation Services and purporting to show fallout patterns, is confirmed to be a hoax. A map from ZAMG in Vienna models the plume. This post has been updated Friday, March 18 2011 at 3:00 pm to add the ZAMG info, which is on its own page. News sources Wikipedia: Fukushima I Nuclear Power Plant; Fukushima I nuclear accidents.
